title: Notifications are now here!
text: Now when you visit the site you can see what's changed since your last visit.

title: PokeFinder 4.0.0 Release
text:
There is a new PokeFinder release with initial Gen 8 support!
PokeFinder 4.0.0 Release

title: New "Rough Drafts" category!
text:
Lots of people love viewing rough drafts while they're being written. Now rough drafts can be viewed on the site instead of on GitHub!
Click here to view the rough drafts!
